code: /**  * return the total document count  */ long getDocCount().

comment: /**  * return total field count (differs from docCount if there are missing values)  */
code: /**  * return total field count (differs from docCount if there are missing values)  */ long getFieldCount(String field).
/**  * return the field mean  */ double getMean(String field).
/**  * return the field variance  */ double getVariance(String field).

comment: /**  * return the skewness of the distribution  */
code: /**  * return the skewness of the distribution  */ double getSkewness(String field).

comment: /**  * return the kurtosis of the distribution  */
code: /**  * return the kurtosis of the distribution  */ double getKurtosis(String field).

comment: /**  * return the covariance between field x and field y  */
code: /**  * return the covariance between field x and field y  */ double getCovariance(String fieldX, String fieldY).

comment: /**  * return the correlation coefficient of field x and field y  */
code: /**  * return the correlation coefficient of field x and field y  */ double getCorrelation(String fieldX, String fieldY).
